Folder.Name: U1 :: The Unending Coil of Bahamut (Ultimate)

Trigger.Name: # Instance
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Unending Coil of Bahamut \(Ultimate\) has begun\.

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my foes!

Trigger.Name: (Divebomb) Meteor Stream > Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, exalt you the red moon!

Trigger.Name: (Divebomb) Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, scorch you the earth!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Lunar Dynamo
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From on high I descend, the hallowed moon to call!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From on high I descend, the iron path to (call|walk)!

Trigger.Name: Thermionic Beam > Iron Chariot
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|Blazing path, lead me to iron rule!

Trigger.Name: Raven Dive > Lunar Dynamo > Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From on high I descend, the moon and stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Raven Dive > Meteor Stream
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of stars to bring!

Trigger.Name: Iron Chariot > Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Iron Chariot > Thermionic Beam > Raven Dive
Lunar Dynamo > Raven Dive > Thermionic Beam
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From hallowed moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread!

Trigger.Name: Lunar Dynamo > Iron Chariot > Raven Dive
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^\|]*\|0044\|[^\|]*\|From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my descent to wield!

Action.Description: Save your own clone's ID in variable cloneID
Fate Calibration Header (Move me!) | Toggle to enable/disable images
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection
Sort clonelist after list has been made
Fire Clone TTS Trigger if variables are sufficient
Fire Clone Image Trigger if variables are sufficient
Unset obsolete scalar variables at Fate Calibration cast finish
Unset clonelist at Fate Calibration cast finish
Deactivate images at real Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament

Folder.Name: P1 - Ser Adelphel, Ser Grinnaux & Ser Charibert

Action.Description: 1.0s Delay - (Disable the ones you do not need below)

Trigger.Name: Wave Cannon - Swap Callout (Set this up)

Action.Description: 0.1s Delay - (Disable the ones you do not need below)
